attributes.action: Lower Costs on fruit and veg
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Doctors are saying our body needs 5 portions of fruit or veg a day and i for one think 5 portions of fruit and veg are too dear. 5 portions of fruit come to approximatly £1.50. and people all over the world would like to have 5 portions of fruit and veg a day but can't afford it. for example: 
a family has a mother, father and two children. thats £6.00 everyday to keep thier bodys healthy. £6 a day is £42 a week. 
How many people want to spend £42 a week to keep healthy? I for one would like to see the prices of fruit go down. please contact me back.
thank you
